title: Type specimens of Dutch Typefaces in holland
content:
Dear Holland typophiles!

I need some info about places (bookshops?) in Rotterdam and Amsterdam where I can find a copy (used) of "Dutch Type" by Jan Middendorp or old type specimens of Dutch Typefaces. Does anyone here knows some places?

Thanks in advance!  
António
author: afonseca1974

comments.content:
A Dutch secondhand books website offers a specimen for 90€: [http://bit.ly/1epfanb](http://web.archive.org/web/20140802233826/http:/bit.ly/1epfanb "http://bit.ly/1epfanb")  
Hope that helps.

Georg
